hackathon-description-text: WE ARE BRINGING STUDENTS WITH A PASSION IN TECHNOLOGY FROM ALL OVER THE UNITED KINGDOM TOGETHER FOR THE FIRST TIME IN BRIGHTON, WITH THE ABILITY TO BUILD AND SHARE AT THE UNIVERSITY OF SUSSEX'S CAMPUS.
hackathon-eligibility: Over 18's only. To win prizes you must not work on a project started before the event, and team sizes are limited to 4 max.
hackathon-requirements: There are presentations for the judging, therefore remember to make a usable demo and focus on that, if you talk too much about the project you may run out of time
hackathon-rules:
Explained on site
Code of conduct can be viewed

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Medals for the top placing team

hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Amazon Web Services - Best Use Of

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=Falmer House, Falmer, Brighton, The City of Brighton and Hove BN1 9QF, UK

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: The team that creates the most interesting hack focused on developer productivity will win a Raspberry Pi 3 Starter Kit for each team member (bonus point if the focus is on code reuse).
We'll be looking to speak to some of you about your pain points as developers – the participant giving us the most insightful feedback will win a £50 Amazon gift card.

hackathon-location-address: Falmer House, Falmer, Brighton, The City of Brighton and Hove BN1 9QF, UK
hackathon-description-header: 24 hour Hackathon at the University of Sussex
hackathon-location-description: University of Sussex - Mandela Hall, Falmer House
